data.current_summary: Returns a list of hotels matching a given keyword.
data.summary_suggestion: Search hotels by keyword or location code
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of hotels matching the provided search criteria. Accepts hotel name keywords or IATA location codes (e.g., LON for London, NYC for New York) as input. Returns hotel autocomplete suggestions with hotel identifiers and names. This operation is useful for hotel name autocomplete functionality and location-based hotel discovery. Note: The test environment uses a subset of production data; for testing, use major cities like LON or NYC.
